issue.title: [Doc][Python] Sphinx Copybutton should ignore IPython prompt text
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16567](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16567). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Sphinx Copybutton configuration set in [docs/source/conf.py](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/90aac16761b7dbf5fe931bc8837cad5116939270/docs/source/conf.py#L94-L96) should be updated to ignore Ipython propmt text in examples that use IPython directive, example:

[https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/dataset.html](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/python/dataset.html#dataset-discovery)

See: <https://sphinx-copybutton.readthedocs.io/en/latest/use.html#using-regexp-prompt-identifiers>

This can be changed once the work on ARROW-13159 will be done.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16567?focusedCommentId=17538076) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
> This can be changed once the work on ARROW-13159 will be done.

If we decide to remove the IPython directive / code blocks in ARROW-13159 (which I think we want to do), this is actually no longer needed. So I think this change would only be useful on the short term _before_ ARROW-13159 will be done (but it can certainly still be useful to do)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16567?focusedCommentId=17538092) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
